step.description: Prerequisite: 1. My Settings Check for Product Branding graphics for 'WEB OF SCIENCE™' at top of page.
step.expected: 'WEB OF SCIENCE™' graphic is displayed at top of the page.
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Text: 'quality.tester@testcases.com' was sent to the 'Email' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='email']")), textbox content after sending is 'quality.tester@testcases.com'
Text: '!12345654321a' was sent to the 'Password' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='password']")), textbox content after sending is '!12345654321a'
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.

step.description: Check for Product Branding graphics Alt-Text for 'WEB OF SCIENCE™' page by placing the mouse cursor over the product branding graphic.
step.expected: Alt-text for 'WEB OF SCIENCE™' graphic is displayed as 'Web Of Science' when the mouse cursor is placed over the product branding graphics.
step.substep: Alt-text of Link 'EndNoteTM' equals: Web of Science All Databases Search

step.description: Check for THOMSON REUTERS™ graphics at top right of My Settings Page
Check for THOMSON REUTERS™ graphic Alt text by placing the mouse cursor over the THOMSON REUTERS™ branding graphic.
step.expected: Alt text for 'THOMSON REUTERS™' graphic is displayed as ”Thomson Reuters” when the mouse cursor is placed over the product branding graphics.
step.substep: Alt-text of Link 'Clarivate Analytics' equals: Clarivate Analytics Logo

step.description: Click 'WEB OF SCIENCE™' at top of page.
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Web of Science'. Expected result: True.

TestCase.name: MySett_050_1
TestCase.description: Select a Starting Application - Applying 'KCI - Korean Journal Database' collection as starting application.

step.description: Prerequisite:My Settings- Select a Starting Application Select a radio button for 'KCI - Korean Journal Database' and click' Submit Changes button'
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Text: 'workingTest@gmail.com' was sent to the 'Email' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='email']")), textbox content after sending is 'workingTest@gmail.com'
Text: 'passw0rd!' was sent to the 'Password' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='password']")), textbox content after sending is 'passw0rd!'
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Select a Starting Application Link'. Expected result: True.
Select a Starting Application page was opened
Clicking Button 'Submit Changes button'. Expected result: True.

step.description: Click 'Edit My Information' link and select 'Sign me in automatically' radio button, then press 'Submit Changes' button
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Edit My Information'. Expected result: True.
Selecting Radio Button 'Auto Sign In On'. Expected result: True.
Text: 'passw0rd!' was sent to the 'Current Password' textbox (XPath("//input[@name='currPassword']")), textbox content after sending is 'passw0rd!'
Clicking Button 'Submit Changes'. Expected result: True.

step.description: Click Log out link from Top Toolbar
Sign to WOK using auto sign in
step.expected: KCI - Korean Journal Database collection is selected by default.

Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Sign Out'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Open New Connection'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Radio Button 'Token CGI'. Expected result: True.
